articles.title: 8.8-Magnitude Earthquake Strikes Russia's Far East, Sending Tsunami Waves Across Pacific
articles.description: An 8.8 magnitude earthquake struck Russia’s far east early Wednesday, sending tsunami waves to Japan, Hawaii, and the U.S. West Coast. Initially, millions of people were in the path of the tsunami and were told to take steps to move away from the shore and seek higher ground. But no major damage has been reported so far.

articles.title: Canada Will Recognize Palestinian State at UN General Assembly: Carney
articles.description: Canada has joined several Western countries in announcing its intention to recognize a Palestinian state amid the continuing Israeli atrocities unfolding in Gaza. Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney made the announcement on Wednesday, explaining that Ottawa had hoped that a two-state solution could be achieved through a negotiated peace process, but that approach was 'no longer tenable.'

articles.title: Trump Hits India with 25% Tariff, Extra 'Penalty' for Russian Oil Purchases
articles.description: United States President Donald Trump has announced a 25 percent tariff on Indian goods, as well as an unspecified penalty for the country’s purchase of Russian oil and military equipment, as the unending war in Ukraine frustrates the White House. Trump announced the trade moves on his Truth Social account on Wednesday, saying they are necessary to reverse a long-running trade imbalance.
